attributes.action: All Age's Live Music Venue In Birmingham!
attributes.additional_details: majority of music venues in the birmingham district are either 18+ or have either closed down, people who are under the age of 18 cannot attend an event due to there age, i believe that there should be a ALL age's venue located in birmingham! and allow every type of music available! help keep music alive and get a all age venue where we need it!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
